docs.lead_paragraph: Hearts that have been weary waiting for the May, like that of the poet McCarthy, will be satisfied to-morrow, even if cold waves are predicted and Spring is more than a month behind its usual date. There will be few regrets over the passing of April, which, with its long-continued cold, its disappointments and vexations, was really only a replica of March this year.
